title: Courage of the Colossus is disgusting on Riven
body:
She builds typical lifesteal attack damage bruiser and literally becomes unkillable. You have to keep her perma-CCed so she can't keep being permashielded and lifesteal back to full with two autos. It's disgustingly unfun to play against and totally breaks an already aggravating champion. Forget Poppy, forget Hecarim, this shit is cancerous.

EDIT: I'm not saying Riven is the only abuse case, she just happens to be a particularly toxic offender. Mao, Naut, Zac, Darius, etc. are all still annoying to face with this mastery.

It actually allows her to engage fights more reliably and makes her sacrifice the damage output of a full damage build for better team fighting. It makes almost no difference to her lane phase if she had it or not. And she gives up the scaling on Fervor which her kit actually uses well. 

That being said I'd be way more comfortable fighting her than something like poppy who builds pretty much full tank and still has high base damages to eat your ass for breakfast. She doesn't nearly rely as heavily on snowballing like Riven does and has a better kit to work with her team.

You must not have ever faced it. She sacrifices little to no damage at all - and Fervor granted so much free power that it warped champion design, so champs _without _ it are what they should be like. Riven has generally been balanced (and balanced is a difficult word to use in the same sentence with Riven) around the fact that her E is pretty much always up, so she's being shielded for 100% of her bonus AD like all the time. Her getting more shielding off of that totally breaks how she should be played and makes her ridiculously frustrating to face. 

I played against a Riven last game who got fed off a _Garen_ her biggest counter mind you- with that mastery and we had to five man her to kill her, or else she was pretty much always shielded and lifestealed like crazy. It's no fun to play against and I hated every second of it.

Well I have played it, but not against it. It was against a Fiora. This is only one game, just like yours was. I did beat her, but not cause of the mastery, but rather I just did outplay her in several scenarios. The most basic of that being waiting out her parry. Her getting more shielding off just helps her teamfighting when it was god awful if she isn't fed. The champ herself has always been trouble to shut down when she gets the ball rolling. 

And it's completely possible the Garen wasn't even good. Your match history shows the Riven was Diamond against a Silver player. I've tried Garen into Riven myself before thinking how easy it was a matchup to just beat her with better sustain, tankiness, and silences. It blew up in my face badly because I really am not a Garen player. 

And even then I can't really tell what she was building all game, but nothing about her build from your match history is bruiser Riven. She ended the game on a pretty standard damage build on Riven. You having to five man kill her was just her being fed most likely and Garen not doing as good as she did that game. She even had 8k gold on Garen at 22k compared to his 14k with almost double his CS. The next highest gold being Corki and Vi at 17k. 

The new mastery definitely improved a lot of champs, but I think you blew things out of proportion against a fed Riven. And this was your only match against Riven with CotC.

Actually Garen isn't her hardest match up lol. While the silence does cause Riven some issues he has ALOT longer cooldowns then her which makes taking trades against Garen quite easily once you learn to play around his silence. I'd say Rivens hardest matchups are against either Tanky Champs (Naut, Mao which are abusing the mastery more I might add) if they don't all in her early and get armor, aswell as either Jayce, or Kennen as they can both poke her down and disengage her all ins quite easily. I'm not saying the mastery isn't strong everyone with any sense of the game meta knows this mastery is extremely strong and nearly any champion who has CC in his kit (I even run it on Diana LUL) is abusing it and the mastery WILL get nerfed. Calling out one champion is pointless because they all are.
